org.drombler.acp.core.action

Annotation Type ToggleMenuEntry


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=SOURCE)
 @Target(value={TYPE,PACKAGE})
public @interface ToggleMenuEntry
    This annotation registers a toggle menu entry.
    Author:
    puce

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String path
      A slash '/' delimited path of menu IDs.
      int position
      The position to order the menu items in a menu.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String actionId
      The id of the toggle action to be registered as a toggle menu item.
      String toggleGroupId
      The id of a toggle group.

    • Element Detail

      • path

        public abstract String path
        A slash '/' delimited path of menu IDs.
        Returns:
        a slash '/' delimited path of menu IDs
        See Also:
        Menu

      • position

        public abstract int position
        The position to order the menu items in a menu. It's a best practice to leave out some positions between entries to allow other bundles to register entries between some existing ones.
        Returns:
        the position to order the menu items in a menu

      • actionId

        public abstract String actionId
        The id of the toggle action to be registered as a toggle menu item. This property can be omitted, if there is an ToggleAction annotation on the same class.
        Returns:
        the id of the toggle action to be registered as a toggle menu item
        See Also:
        ToggleAction.id()
        Default:
        ""

      • toggleGroupId

        public abstract String toggleGroupId
        The id of a toggle group. Toggle groups are managed implicitly. All toggle menu entries with the same toggle group id are grouped in the same toggle group. If no group id is provided then the toggle menu entry won't be part of a toggle group.
        Returns:
        the id of a toggle group
        Default:
        ""
